title: Correctional Officer Reality-Based Self-Defense Technology Application Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Theoretical knowledge of basic self-defense techniques and understanding of correctional work
context.additional_context: Reality-based scenario-driven training reflecting diverse crisis situations in actual correctional environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply appropriate self-defense techniques with 80% or higher accuracy in three or more risk scenarios.
Learners can effectively execute techniques in at least 70% of scenarios during post-training evaluation.
Learners can explain the linkage between situational judgment and skill application through team-based simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
